artikel.judul: Hasil Lengkap Formula 1 GP Jerman dan Klasemen Pembalap | Tempo Otomotif
artikel.isi:
Pembalap Mercedes Lewis Hamilton berhasil menjuarai Grand Prix Formula 1 Jerman di Hockenheimring, Hockenheim, Minggu waktu setempat. Sedangkan pembalap Indonesia, Rio Haryanto, finis di urutan ke-20.
Berikut hasil lengkap balapan: 1. Lewis Hamilton GBR Mercedes-Mercedes 67 laps 1 jam 30 menit 44,200 detik 2. Daniel Ricciardo AUS Red Bull-Renault +06.900 3. Max Verstappen NED Red Bull-Renault +13.400 4. Nico Rosberg GER Mercedes-Mercedes +15.800 5. Sebastian Vettel GER Ferrari-Ferrari +32.500 6. Kimi Raikkonen FIN Ferrari-Ferrari +37.000 7. Nico Hulkenberg GER Force India-Mercedes +70.000 8. Jenson Button GBR McLaren-Honda +1 lap 9. Valtteri Bottas FIN Williams-Mercedes +1 lap 10. Sergio Perez MEX Force India-Mercedes +1 lap 11. Esteban Gutierrez MEX Haas-Ferrari +1 lap 12. Fernando Alonso ESP McLaren-Honda +1 lap 13 Romain Grosjean FRA Haas-Ferrari +1 lap 14. Carlos Sainz Jr ESP Toro Rosso-Ferrari +1 lap 15. Daniil Kvyat RUS Toro Rosso-Ferrari +1 lap 16. Kevin Magnussen DEN Renault-Renault +1 lap 17. Pascal Wehrlein GER Manor-Mercedes +2 laps 18. Marcus Ericsson SWE Sauber-Ferrari +2 laps 19. Jolyon Palmer GBR Renault-Renault +2 laps 21. Rio Haryanto INA Manor-Mercedes +2 laps Felipe Nasr BRA Sauber-Ferrari (gagal finis) Felipe Massa BRZ Williams-Mercedes (gagal finis).
Klasemen Umum Pembalap
1 Lewis Hamilton Mercedes AMG Petronas 217 poin 2 Nico Rosberg Mercedes AMG Petronas 198 3 Daniel Ricciardo Red Bull Racing 133 4 Kimi Raikkonen Scuderia Ferrari 122 5 Sebastian Vettel Scuderia Ferrari 120 6 Max Verstappen Red Bull Racing / Scuderia Toro Rosso 115 7 Valtteri Bottas Williams Martini Racing 62 8 Sergio Perez Sahara Force India 48 9 Felipe Massa Williams Martini Racing 38 10 Nico Hulkenberg Sahara Force India 33 11 Carlos Sainz Scuderia Toro Rosso 30 12 Romain Grosjean Haas F1 Team 28 13 Fernando Alonso McLaren-Honda 24 14 Daniil Kvyat Scuderia Toro Rosso / Red Bull Racing 23 15 Jenson Button McLaren-Honda 17 16 Kevin Magnussen Renault Sport F1 6 17 Pascal Wehrlein Manor 1 18 Stoffel Vandoorne McLaren-Honda 1.
